name: Blood Bat
description:
Blood Bat is a Shoot-em-up like game (this is how I would describe it)

You are a bat wich health is blood, you obtain the blood by attacking enemies.

Blood is also used by card abilities, You get cards from enemys wich you can pick up

and if you do so, you will get a special ability, wich consumes blood!

(Here are some tips: To skip to the next wave press 'R', There is an tutorial level wich explains the game mechanics.)

This game was created for the Mini- game jam in 66h

Have fun!
